backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting print-specific typography/spacing adjustments and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing prewritten summaries of key frontend components, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH theme variables, dark-mode overrides, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component managing all report-card state and handling print, export, import, and reset actions.
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/Atten: Form section for attendance, result, and remarks with compact print-focused layout.
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/CoSch: Table for editing co‑scholastic field grades with reduced print padding and font sizes.
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/Repor: Layout wrapper rendering school headers and student info fields with print‑optimized spacing and background form image.
frontend/src/components/ReportCard/Schol: Renders a detailed marks table for each subject, computing totals and derived values using imported mark utilities. Handles validation, formatting, and input updates per subject row.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes. Returns the current actor and its fetch status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management for auth status. Exposes hooks to access identity and control login/logout.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables, base styles, and extensive print styles for consistent report card formatting. Includes light/dark theme tokens and utility overrides for print layout.
frontend/src/lib/defaultData.ts: Exports default subject and field mark templates with empty initial values for initializing report card state. Provides predefined subject and co‑scholastic field lists.
frontend/src/lib/marks.ts: Implements parsing, formatting, and calculation utilities for UT totals, weighted components, overall totals, column sums, and percentage. Performs validation checks before aggregating marks.
frontend/src/lib/reportCardIO.ts: Builds export payloads, downloads report card data as JSON, and validates imported JSON structures. Ensures subjects, fields, attendance, and metadata match expected formats.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for subjects, fields, attendance, totals, and full report card state and export payloads. Centralizes type definitions for marks and report card data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge. Simplifies conditional class name composition.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides validation helpers for numeric inputs, checking range bounds and non‑negativity, returning structured validation results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, requirements, known issues, and architectural notes for building the marks-report app.
